Our Ayurvedic Therapies

Holistic treatments designed to rejuvenate your body, mind, and soul.

Panchakarma: The Ultimate Detox

Panchakarma is the cornerstone of Ayurvedic healing. It is a comprehensive series of five therapies designed to deeply cleanse, detoxify, and rejuvenate the body at a cellular level, removing deep-seated toxins (ama) and restoring the natural balance of your doshas.

Key Benefits:
  • Elimination of toxins and purification of the body.
  • Improved metabolism and digestive health.
  • Enhanced immunity and profound stress reduction.

Abhyanga: Rhythmic Herbal Massage

Abhyanga is a traditional massage performed with warm, medicated herbal oils. The rhythmic, gentle strokes help to deeply penetrate the skin, relax the nervous system, and nourish the tissues. It is an act of self-love that promotes profound stability and warmth.

Key Benefits:
  • Deep relaxation and lasting stress relief.
  • Improved blood circulation and detoxification.
  • Softer, smoother skin and reduced signs of aging.

Shirodhara: A Stream of Tranquility

Shirodhara is a unique therapy where a continuous stream of warm, medicated oil is gently poured over the forehead (the 'third eye'). This profoundly calming treatment works directly on the central nervous system, helping to quiet the mind and induce deep peace.

Key Benefits:
  • Powerful relief from anxiety, insomnia, and mental fatigue.
  • Improved memory, focus, and concentration.
  • Alleviation of headaches, migraines, and hypertension.

Specialty Clinics

We provide specialized, result-oriented care for a range of health concerns.

Pain Management

Holistic solutions for joint pain, arthritis, back pain, and musculoskeletal issues.

Stress & Lifestyle

Managing stress, anxiety, insomnia, and other lifestyle-related disorders.

Women's Health

Specialized care for hormonal imbalances, PCOD, and menstrual disorders.

Skin & Allergy

Natural treatments for psoriasis, eczema, acne, and various skin allergies.

Postnatal Care

Comprehensive care programs for new mothers to support recovery and well-being.

Wellness & Rejuvenation

Therapies focused on boosting immunity, vitality, and promoting graceful aging.
